casebody.data:
AMERICAN NICKEL CORPORATION, Plaintiff in Error, v. Arthur SELIGMAN, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 16, 1927. No. 342. Williamson & Bayles, of New York City (Pliny W. Williamson and Walter L. Bryant, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Blake, Durham, De Milhau & Conwell, of New York City (E. V. Conwell and Louis J. De Milhau, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before MANTON and L. HAND, Circuit Judges, and CAMPBELL, District Judge.'

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. •
